00740         T** ptrArrM;

00745         //===================================================================
00773         void allocPtrArr( )
00774         {
00775                 if( this->nd == 0 )
00776                 {
00777                         ptrArrM = new T*[ rowsM = 0 ];
00778                 }
00779                 else
00780                 {
00781                         ptrArrM = new T*[ rowsM = (this->d)[ 0 ] ];
00782                         for( unsigned i = 0, j = 0; i < (this->d)[ 0 ]; ++i, j += (this->d)[ 1 ] )
00783                         {
00784                                 ptrArrM[ i ] = this->e + j;
00785                         }
00786                 }
00787         }
00788 
00789         //===================================================================
00806         void deallocPtrArr( )
00807         {
00808                 delete[ ] ptrArrM;
00809         }
00810 
00811         //===================================================================
00828         void reallocPtrArr( )

00830                 deallocPtrArr( );
00831                 allocPtrArr( );
00832         }

00905 {

00926           : Array2D< T >( )

00954     Array2DReference( Array< T >& v )
00955           : Array2D< T >( )
00956     {
00957         this->d    = v.dimvec( );
00958         this->e    = v.elemvec( );
00959         this->nd   = v.ndim( );
00960         this->ne   = v.nelem( );
00961         this->stat = true;
00962         this->eEnd = this->e + this->ne;
00963         this->reallocPtrArr( );
00964     }
